original_text: Trust ye not in a friend, put ye not confidence in a guide: keep the doors of thy mouth from her that lieth in thy bosom.
korean_text: 너희는 이웃을 믿지 말며 친구를 의지하지 말며 네 품에 누운 여인에게라도 네 입의 문을 지킬지어다

sentences.original_text: Trust ye not in a friend
put ye not confidence in a guide
keep the doors of thy mouth
from her that lieth in thy bosom
